posts.post_content:
I'm brokering this card from the recent North Carolina find. To note, the gentleman that owns the collection will be the payee, by money order or cashiers check only, and he will also handle the shipping (w/ insurance included), although I completely stand behind any transaction(s).

Emails have priority: [url]trae@t206.org[/url]
Offers welcome.

Scan + price here:
[url]http://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/ncfind/t216-people-tobacco[/url]
